name: happycenter
0:
”Alexa, open happy center”
”schedule a phone call”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy center
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill provides quick telephone consultation service for users of Happy connect.
Upon call request received, a designated counselor will conducts telephone consultation service with customer.
This consultation provides general Q&A and technical supports of using Ai speaker.
